text: Hidden in Plain Sight: Augmented Reality Game
Can you find all 9 hidden animals?
Florida is home to many kinds of native wildlife that use their ability to camouflage in order to stay safe from predators. See if you can find all 9 hidden animals in less than a minute!
Point your camera at the exhibit.
Center an animal on your screen.
Keep it centered until you see a flash!
Check out Rory's album below to see his notes about each species
